name: ListMerchantDevices
description:
Retrieve a list of devices for a merchant's terminal API.

This tool is used to list all devices associated with a merchant, specifically for the Terminal API. It is helpful for businesses needing an overview of their registered devices.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: A string used to fetch the next set of device results. Obtained from a prior API call, it facilitates pagination.

value_schema.description:
A pagination cursor returned by a previous call to this endpoint.
Provide this cursor to retrieve the next set of results for the original query.
See [Pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/pagination) for more information.

parameters.name: device_listing_order
parameters.description: Specifies whether to list devices from oldest to newest ('ASC') or newest to oldest ('DESC').

value_schema.description:
The order in which results are listed.
- `ASC` - Oldest to newest.
- `DESC` - Newest to oldest (default).

parameters.name: results_page_limit
parameters.description: The number of results to return in a single page. Use this to control pagination of the device list.

value_schema.description: The number of results to return in a single page.

parameters.name: filter_by_location_id
parameters.description: Return devices only at the specified location ID, if provided.

value_schema.description: If present, only returns devices at the target location.
